mapper.sql: ID, DEPT_ID, USER_PHONE, WORK_NUMBER, NAME, PASSWORD, YXBZ, MEMO, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE, CREATEUSER, MODIFYUSER, USER_NAME, CSRQ, SFZH, XB, NZYH, ZW, LD, QRZXL, ZGXL, CYJCZ, EMAIL, JTDZ
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_PERSON.nextval from dual
insert into CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON (ID, DEPT_ID, USER_PHONE, WORK_NUMBER, NAME, PASSWORD, YXBZ, MEMO, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE, CREATEUSER, MODIFYUSER, USER_NAME, CSRQ, SFZH, XB, NZYH, ZW, LD, QRZXL, ZGXL, CYJCZ, EMAIL, JTDZ) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxbz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{nzyh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrzxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zgxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyjcz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select SEQ_PERSON.nextval from dual

mapper.update:
update CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
USER_PHONE = #{record.userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_NUMBER = #{record.workNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YXBZ = #{record.yxbz,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{record.createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYDATE = #{record.modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEUSER = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYUSER = #{record.modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSRQ = #{record.csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SFZH = #{record.sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XB = #{record.xb,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
NZYH = #{record.nzyh,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ZW = #{record.zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LD = #{record.ld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QRZXL = #{record.qrzxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZGXL = #{record.zgxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CYJCZ = #{record.cyjcz,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTDZ = #{record.jtdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, USER_PHONE = #{record.userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_NUMBER = #{record.workNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXBZ = #{record.yxbz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{record.createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFYDATE = #{record.modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEUSER = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYUSER = #{record.modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRQ = #{record.csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SFZH = #{record.sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XB = #{record.xb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, NZYH = #{record.nzyh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZW = #{record.zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LD = #{record.ld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QRZXL = #{record.qrzxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZGXL = #{record.zgxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYJCZ = #{record.cyjcz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTDZ = #{record.jtdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_NUMBER = #{workNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YXBZ = #{yxbz,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SFZH = #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XB = #{xb,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
NZYH = #{nzyh,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ZW = #{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LD = #{ld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QRZXL = #{qrzxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZGXL = #{zgxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CYJCZ = #{cyjcz,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTDZ = #{jtdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON set DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_NUMBER = #{workNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXBZ = #{yxbz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SFZH = #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XB = #{xb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, NZYH = #{nzyh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZW = #{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LD = #{ld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QRZXL = #{qrzxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZGXL = #{zgxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYJCZ = #{cyjcz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTDZ = #{jtdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.name AS DEPTNAME FROM CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON A INNER JOIN CHECKMIS.SYS_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID=B.ID WHERE B.TYPE=0 AND A.CYJCZ =1 AND A.YXBZ=1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ST_GZRW XX LEFT JOIN ST_GZRWXZ YY ON YY.GZRW_ID=XX.ID LEFT JOIN ST_GZRWXZCY ZZ ON ZZ.GZRWXZ_ID=YY.ID WHERE ZZ.WORK_NUMBER=A.WORK_NUMBER AND XX.ID=#{gzrwId} AND YY.TYPE < 2 )

select A.*,B.name as DEPTNAME,C.NAME AS unitName from CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON A Left JOIN CHECKMIS.SYS_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN CHECKMIS.SYS_UNIT C ON C.ID=B.UNIT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEPT_ID IN
#{item}
AND ( A.NAME LIKE '%'||#{q.key}||'%' OR B.NAME LIKE '%'||#{q.key}||'%' OR A.USER_PHONE =#{q.key} )

SELECT A.* FROM CHECKMIS.SYS_PERSON A Left JOIN CHECKMIS.SYS_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID=B.ID
WHERE B.type = #{deptType}
